Correlation plots 
========================================================

```{r}

#install.packages("corrplot")
library(corrplot)

data<-read.csv("GEO_subset.csv")
scaled.dat <- scale(data)
View(scaled.dat)
M<-cor(data,method="spearman")
M<-cor(scaled.dat,method="spearman")
write.table(M,"GEO_subset_corr.csv",sep="\t")
corrplot(M,method="circle")
corrplot(M,method="color")
corrplot(M,method="number")
corrplot(M,method="circle",type="upper")
####################################################

```
